questions.name: Num-Guesses-1
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Q: What is the maximum number of guesses you can make in a game of Wordle?
A) 5
B) 6
C) 7
D) No limit
questions.question_usr:
Q: What is the maximum number of guesses you can make in a game of Wordle?
A) 5
B) 6
C) 7
D) No limit
questions.question_sys: Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.

questions.name: Num-Letter-1
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Q: How many letter are in the word you are trying to guess?
A) 4
B) 5
C) 6
D) Any amount

questions.name: Terminology-Present-1
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Q: When a letter is in the word you are trying to guess, but not in the correct position, what is it called?
A) Present
B) Absent
C) Correct
D) None of the above
questions.question_usr:
Q: When a letter is in the word you are trying to guess, but not in the correct position, what is it called?
A) Present
B) Absent
C) Correct
D) None of the above
questions.question_sys: Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
questions.completion: The answer is B) Absent. In Wordle, when a letter is in the word but not in the correct position, it's considered an absent letter.

questions.name: Terminology-Absent-1
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Q: When a letter is not in the word you are trying to guess, what is it called?
A) Present
B) Absent
C) Correct
D) None of the above
questions.question_usr:
Q: When a letter is not in the word you are trying to guess, what is it called?
A) Present

C) Correct
D) None of the above
questions.question_sys: Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
questions.completion: The answer is A) Absent. In Wordle, absent letters are those that are not part of the hidden five-letter word.

questions.name: Mechanics-Multiletter-1
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Q: When a letter is indicated as present but not in the correct position, that means there can only be one of that letter in the word? 
A) True
B) False

A) True
B) False

questions.name: Mechanics-Guess-Valid-Word
questions.ground_truth: D) No - you cannot guess a word that is not in the dictionary
questions.question:
Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
Can you guess any combination of letters as your guess?
A) Yes - as long as its only five letters
B) Yes - as long as the letters are in the alphabet
C) No - you cannot repeat letters
D) No - you cannot guess a word that is not in the dictionary
questions.question_usr:
Can you guess any combination of letters as your guess?
A) Yes - as long as its only five letters
B) Yes - as long as the letters are in the alphabet
C) No - you cannot repeat letters
D) No - you cannot guess a word that is not in the dictionary
questions.question_sys: Below is a question about the game Wordle. Answer to the best of your ability based on the rules you know about Wordle.
questions.completion: The answer is D) No - you cannot guess a word that is not in the dictionary. In Wordle, each guess must be a valid five-letter English word from the dictionary. A, B, and C are correct in their own ways
